VXLIB Function Reference

Accumulate

OpenVX Function Description

  • Accumulates an input image into output image.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d0/d77/group__group__vision__function__accumulate.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_accumulateImage_i8u_io16s : Input image is U8 format and output image is S16 format
    • Calls internally: VXLIB_add_i8u_i16s_o16s
